title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, there is a discrepancy in the format displayed in the dynamic text item and the data/text item. The datetime values are displayed differently in these two items.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Retrieve a datetime value from a table.
2. Display the value in a dynamic text item.
3. Display the value in a data/text item.
4. Compare the format of the datetime value in both items.
